name: Axiomatic Discourse
text: You take inspiration from the greatest debaters and speakers of Axis and weave words with precision, limiting misunderstandings and sharpening comprehension.
benefit:
You can activate this feat’s benefits as part of a Diplomacy check to influence a creature’s attitude (before determining the outcome). If you fail the Diplomacy check, the target’s attitude towards you does not decrease unless you fail the check by 10 or more. Also, you can attempt a Diplomacy check to influence creatures that do not understand your language, but you take a –4 penalty on the check.

Once per day for every 5 ranks you have in Knowledge (planes), you can attempt a Diplomacy check twice and take the better result.
text_zh: 你从轴心城最伟大的辩论家与演讲者处得到了启发，精准地组织你的言词，减少误会并强化认同。
benefit_zh:
你可以激活此能力作为改变生物态度的交涉检定的一部份（在结果决定前）。若你在交涉检定上失败，那么除非你失败10点或更多，否则目标对你的态度不会下降。此外，你也可以尝试对不理解你的语言的生物进行改变态度的交涉检定，但你在该检定上要承受-4减值。

此外，你可以在一次交涉检定中投两次骰子，并取较好的结果。你每天可以使用此能力的次数为每5级知识（位面）一次。
